alert.note: Alert for Irion; Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 29 at 10:11PM CDT until March 29 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Tom Green County in west central Texas... Northeastern Irion County in west central Texas... * Until 1100 PM CDT. * At 1010 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Arden, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Arden around 1015 PM CDT. Carlsbad, San Angelo State Park and O.c. Fisher Reservoir around 1030 PM CDT. San Angelo and Grape Creek around 1035 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
